thread.title_full: Medical Solutions Recognized as One of 2015 Best Places to Work in Healthcare

author: Sarah Wengert
title: Medical Solutions Recognized as One of 2015 Best Places to Work in Healthcare
text:
Medical Solutions, one of the nation’s largest travel nurse staffing companies, has been recognized among the 2015 Best Places to Work in Healthcare by Modern Healthcare and will be honored at an awards dinner in Chicago on Wednesday, October 14. Now in its eighth year, the Best Places to Work in Healthcare program recognizes outstanding employers in the healthcare industry nationwide. Modern Healthcare partners with the Best Companies Group to identify and assess candidates, in part, through an extensive employee survey.
“Employee engagement is key to making the transition from volume to value-based care in today’s fast-changing healthcare environment,” said Merrill Goozner, editor of Modern Healthcare. “Companies designated as best places to work have discovered the key to gaining and maintaining that engagement.”
Offering employees an impressive company culture has been an instrumental part of Medical Solutions’ people-first philosophy since day one.
“We strive to give employees a fun, friendly workplace with cutting edge benefits where they are motivated to excel and also recognized for their hard work and talent,” said Christy Johnston, Chief People Officer at Medical Solutions. “It’s extremely gratifying to be recognized as a one of the best places to work in healthcare, and most importantly, to see the positive impact of our efforts reflected in our happy, fulfilled people.”
Click here to see Modern Healthcare’s full list of organizations named to its Best Places to Work in Healthcare for 2015.
ABOUT MEDICAL SOLUTIONS: Medical Solutions L.L.C. is a healthcare staffing firm that specializes in placing registered nurses in temporary travel assignments throughout the nation. The company is one of the largest Travel Nurse staffing agencies in the United States, with locations in Omaha, San Diego, Cincinnati, and Tupelo, MS. Medical Solutions was one of the first Travel Nursing and Allied Healthcare staffing companies to be certified by the Joint Commission and has been continuously certified since January 2005. Medical Solutions was named one of the top three staffing firms to work for in Staffing Industry Analysts’ 2013 “Best Staffing Firms to Work For,” has been named eight times to the Inc. 5000 list of fastest-growing private companies, and its flagship Omaha office won the 2014 Better Business Bureau Integrity Award. A nationwide network of qualified healthcare providers allows Medical Solutions to help its client hospitals continue to provide excellent patient care amidst a nursing shortage. Medical Solutions has contracts with 1,500+ client hospitals nationwide and is one of the fastest-growing companies in the Travel Nursing industry. Visit MedicalSolutions.com to learn more.
